title: Image not showing when DEBUG=False, but it is showing when DEBUG=True
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
Run the docker doccano, create an Image Classification project, and try to upload one image. After that, when DEBUG=True everything work as expected and we can see the image. But when DEBUG=False, we can't see the image (see the image below).

I run doccano using these two command:
command for DEBUG=False
```
docker run -it --rm --name=doccano_original -p 8000:8000 -e "ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin" -e "ADMIN_USERNAME=admin" -e "ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@example.com" -e "DEBUG=False" doccano/doccano
```

command for DEBUG=True
```
docker run -it --rm --name=doccano_original -p 8000:8000 -e "ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin" -e "ADMIN_USERNAME=admin" -e "ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@example.com" -e "DEBUG=True" doccano/doccano
```

What happen when DEBUG=False
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3679860/132329496-ee9399fc-50a8-4b48-8c52-f6bc33a14b13.png)

What happen when DEBUG=True:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3679860/132329642-8614ccb4-8fee-47a6-87fa-69d748976b0c.png)

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Mac OSX
*   Python Version Used: 3.8.6
*   When you install doccano: 1 month ago
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): using docker
